de.lambeck.pned.models.data

Class DataModelController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lambeck.pned.models.data.DataModelController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IInfo_Status, IDataModelController

    public class DataModelController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDataModelController
    Implements a controller for the data models of Petri nets. This means the models that are loaded from or saved to files.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ApplicationController appController
      Reference to the ApplicationController
      private IDataModel currentModel
      Current model is the model that corresponds to the active tab of the tabbed pane.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,IDataModel> dataModels
      List of data models identified by their name (full name of the file)
      private static boolean debug
      Show debug messages?
      private int elementsAddedToCurrentModel
      Counter for the number of added elements during import ("File open").
      protected I18NManager i18n
      The manager for localized strings
      private boolean importingFromPnml
      Indicates whether we are importing data from a PNML file or not.
      private static boolean NEVER_REMOVE_INITIAL_CHECK_STATE
      Predefined parameter because only the ValidationController should change the "initial check" state of the IDataModel.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,IValidationMsgPanel> validationMessagePanels
      List of validation messages panels identified by their name (full name of the file)

        List of validation messages panels identified by their name (full name of the file)

      • importingFromPnml

        private boolean importingFromPnml
        Indicates whether we are importing data from a PNML file or not. This is important to avoid infinite loops when adding elements.

        If true: changes to a data model need to be passed to the GUI model.
        If false: changes to a GUI model need to be passed to the data model.)

      • elementsAddedToCurrentModel

        private int elementsAddedToCurrentModel
        Counter for the number of added elements during import ("File open").

      • addDataModel

        public void addDataModel(java.lang.String modelName,
                         java.lang.String displayName)
        Description copied from interface: IDataModelController
        Adds a data model for a non-existing file.

        Note: This is intended to be used to add new models which are not coming from a PNML file (e.g. "Untitled1", "Untitled2"... or "New1", "New2"...)
        Specified by:
        addDataModel in interface IDataModelController
        Parameters:
        modelName - The full path name of the PNML file
        displayName - The title of the tab (= the file name)

      • addDataModel

        public int addDataModel(java.io.File pnmlFile)
        Description copied from interface: IDataModelController
        Adds a data model for an existing file.

        Exit codes:
        - ExitCode.OPERATION_SUCCESSFUL: OK
        - ExitCode.OPERATION_FAILED: Error: Could not open the file!
        - ExitCode.OPERATION_CANCELED: Error: Data model not accepted!
        Specified by:
        addDataModel in interface IDataModelController
        Parameters:
        pnmlFile - The file to use for read-in.
        Returns:
        The exit code

        private IValidationMsgPanel addValidationMessagePanel(java.lang.String modelName)
        Called by addDataModel to add an associated IValidationMsgPanel.
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        Returns:
        The IValidationMsgPanel

      • acceptModel

        private boolean acceptModel(java.lang.String canonicalPath,
                            int returnValue)
        Returns the result of acceptModel(returnValue) and shows additional (user friendly) info or error messages with the file name.
        Parameters:
        canonicalPath - The canonical path of the file (used as name for the data model)
        returnValue - The exit code of the parser
        Returns:
        True if the input is OK; otherwise false

        Returns:

        public void resetModifiedDataModel(java.lang.String modelName)
        Description copied from interface: IDataModelController
        Resets the "modified" state of the specified model.

        Note: Use this method after loading a PNML file because the model has not been changed by the user after adding elements from the PNML file only.
        Specified by:
        resetModifiedDataModel in interface IDataModelController
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)

        public void addPlaceToCurrentDataModel(java.lang.String id,
                                       EPlaceToken initialTokens,
                                       java.awt.Point position)
        Description copied from interface: IDataModelController
        Adds a place to the current data model.

        Intended use: adding a place after a GUI event when the new place is without a name after creation.
        Specified by:
        addPlaceToCurrentDataModel in interface IDataModelController
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the place
        initialTokens - The initial tokens count of this place
        position - The position (center) of the place

                                       java.lang.String name,
                                       EPlaceToken initialTokens,
                                       java.awt.Point position)
        Description copied from interface: IDataModelController
        Adds a place to the current data model.

        Note: Adds an additional parameter name to the other method addPlaceToCurrentModel(String id, EPlaceToken initialTokens, Point position)

        Intended use: adding a place after reading from a PNML file because these places may have a name.
        Specified by:
        addPlaceToCurrentDataModel in interface IDataModelController
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the place
        name - The name of the place
        initialTokens - The initial tokens count of this place

                                     java.lang.String sourceId,
                                     java.lang.String targetId)
        Description copied from interface: IDataModelController
        Adds an arc to the current data model.

        Note: This method should be the same for GUI events and reading from a PNML file because arcs will have all 3 attributes in either cases.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        id - The id of the arc
        sourceId - The id of the source (Place or Transition)

      • highlightUnreachableDataNode

        public void highlightUnreachableDataNode(java.lang.String modelName,
                                         java.lang.String nodeId,
                                         boolean b)
        Description copied from interface: IDataModelController
        Callback for the AllNodesOnPathsValidator to highlight nodes that cannot be reached from the start place or cannot reach the end place.
        Specified by:
        highlightUnreachableDataNode in interface IDataModelController
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        nodeId - The id of the IDataNode
        b - True = unreachable; False = can be reached from the start place and can reach the end place

      • removeAllDataTokens

        public void removeAllDataTokens(java.lang.String modelName)
        Description copied from interface: IDataModelController
        Removes the token from all DataPlace in the specified data model.

        Intended use: After structural changes in the model
        Specified by:
        removeAllDataTokens in interface IDataModelController
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)

      • getDataModelForValidation

        private IDataModel getDataModelForValidation(java.lang.String modelName)
        Returns the specified IDataModel with suppressed error messages if not found because this error can be expected in rare cases.

        This method is part of the validation process. And the validation controller thread might slightly lagging behind in terms of the current model (e.g. if the user has suddenly closed the current file during validation).
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        Returns:
        The specified IDataModel if found; otherwise null

                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> placesWithRemovedToken)
